item.description:
HOST: Claire P
cell # 603-247-0897

How about an afternoon of ice skating? I will be going to the Cyclones Arena and hope that some of you will join me! Itâ€™s always so much more fun when we do things as a group.
The public skating takes place at 3:00 and last till 4:20. Feel free to join us anytime between those hours. After the event, we will decide on a nearby venue for a hot drink, snack or light meal and great conversation with good company.
Please remember to wear layers and gloves, so that you will stay comfortable and warm. I hope to see you there!

Admission is $5.00, call the center to inquire about the rental rates.

If you will be renting skates, I recommend that you bring extra socks, to be sure that your feet are "cushioned" comfortably into the skates.

The Cyclones Arena is located at 20 Constitution Dr, Hudson NH.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Meetup sign.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Ice Skating in Hudson, NH
